name: PlaceFinder
0:
”Alexa Open Place Finder”
”Search for an Indian buffet In Seattle Washington”
”Find me a Flower Shop Near 94040”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: place finder
des:
To get started, just say Alexa start Place Finder and follow audio hints.

Navigate between places saying "Next" or "Previous". 
Repeat the previous response by saying "Repeat".
Listen to place detailed information by saying "Details".
Listen to place reviews brief by saying "Reviews" (full reviews are not available, this is Yelp limitation, sorry about that).

Allow the skill access your zip code in Alexa app and you will be able to say for searches near your zip:
"Search for an Indian buffet "
"Search for empanadas near here"

Change your search term or location on the fly. No need to repeat the same information. E.g. you said "Search for an Indian buffet In downtown Seattle" and decided to search the same in Everett, WA, just say "Search In Everett Washington" instead of saying "Search for an Indian buffet In Everett Washington". Same applies to both location and search term ("e.g. Search for Chinese buffet" if you want to search in same location). Location and a search term preserved until you end the session with Place Finder.

Do advanced search!
Try "Search for a cheap open Indian buffet Near 94040" will search for $ and $$ price Indian buffets near 94040 zip code.
You can also try "Search for a cheap sushi In North Raleigh" or "Search for a open burger place In Sunnyvale California".
Or try "Search for seafood markets Near downtown Seattle Sort by rating" which sounds self explanatory.
